import sys
#----CODE----

#input
N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
A_list = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

#finds the max diff between two elements
def find_max_diff(A_list):
    max_diff = 0
    for i in range(N):
        for j in range(i+1, N):
            diff = A_list[j] - A_list[i]
            if diff > max_diff:
                max_diff = diff
    return max_diff

print(find_max_diff(A_list))

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    lmin = a[0]
    rmax = a[-1]
    ans = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        ans = max(ans, max(a[i] - lmin, rmax - a[i]))
        lmin = min(lmin, a[i])
        rmax = max(rmax, a[i])
    print(ans)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
N = int(input())
A = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

max_diff = 0
for i in range(N):
    for j in range(N):
        if i == j:
            continue
        max_diff = max(max_diff, abs(A[i] - A[j]))

print(max_diff)

# finds the max diff between two elements
def find_max_diff(A_list):
    max_diff = 0
    for i in range(N):
        for j in range(i + 1, N):
            diff = A_list[j] - A_list[i]
            if diff > max_diff:
                max_diff = diff
    return max_diff

N = int(input())
A = [int(i) for i in input().split()]  # list comprehension

max_diff = 0
for i in range(N):
    for j in range(N):
        if i == j:
            continue
        max_diff = max(max_diff, abs(A[i] - A[j]))  # max(a, b)

print(max_diff)


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))[:n]
    lmin = a[0]
    rmax = a[-1]
    ans = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        ans = max(ans, max(a[i] - lmin, rmax - a[i]))
        lmin = min(lmin, a[i])
        rmax = max(rmax, a[i])
    print(ans)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
N = int(input())
A = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

max_diff = 0
for i in range(N):
    for j in range(i, N):
        if i == j:
            continue
        max_diff = max(max_diff, abs(A[i] - A[j]))

print(max_diff)

a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

a.sort()

ans = a[-1] - a[0]

#----CODE----

#input
N = int(input())
A_list = list(map(int, input().split()))

#finds the max diff between two elements in the list
def find_max_diff(A_list):
    max_diff = 0
    for i in range(N):
        for j in range(i+1, N):
            diff = abs(A_list[j] - A_list[i])
            if diff > max_diff: max_diff = diff
    return max_diff

print(find_max_diff(A_list))
